'''''Tolkien : his language, a guide to Quenya''''', written by [[George Horton]], is a book about J.R.R. Tolkien's language.

=From the publisher=

{{blockquote|"This is a guide to Quenya, intended for the use primarily of linguists who want a quick guide to a case study for invented language, and of enthusiasts for the work of Tolkien. Part 1, intended to form the core of the book, is a fast guide to speaking the language, with full information on grammar and pronunciation, as well as a basic vocabulary. Part 2, introduces written Quenya, and extends the vocabulary; as well as presenting passage translation. Part 3, gives the full vocabulary, and additional passage work of a more difficult standard."}}
